file_content.text: Malgus the Betrayer will pay for his treason.
My lord. The stealth fighter is ready for departure.
Welcome. Grand Moff Regus has cleared the stealth fighter for departure.
General Hesker will pilot the vessel to Darth Malgus's space station. Please ruin that traitor, for the Imperial Guard and for the Empire.
No one goes in or out. Grand Moff's orders.
[You must wait a while before repeating this difficulty mode. Return later.]
[You are not yet eligible for this difficulty mode.]
Malgus the Betrayer will pay for his treason.
